name: Mumei
description:
Mumei is a 2D platformer with a sci-fi theme and shooter/survival elements.
Made from scratch with love and hesitation

Controls:
Arrow Key L&R = Move
Arrow Key Up = Jump
Z = Shoot

Credits:
- Abid Jappie (Team Lead, level design)
- Zak Wren (Soundtrack & SFX)
- Daniel Munday (Programmer)
- pie75 (Artist)

Powered by GoDot Engine.

Link to source repo:
https://github.com/abidjappie/ludem-dare-46

Link to LDJam page:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/mumei
